article_title: New health care law complicates tax filing season for many in NC
article_text: The new federal health care law means legions of uninsured and newly insured people face a daunting task in filing their tax returns for this year. The imminent tax law changes are likely to bewilder the people for whom the Affordable Care Act was designed: those with low incomes who needed help to to buy federally subsidized health insurance.

article_metadata.news-keywords: ACA, Affordable, Care, Act, Health, Insurance, Tax, Exemption, Penalty, Subsidy
